tool_description: Tracks price changes over time, calculates trends, and identifies significant price movements for products.

product_id.description: Unique identifier for the product being tracked

current_prices.description: Current price data from different sources

price_sources.description: Source identifiers corresponding to current prices

historical_data.description: JSON string containing historical price data

trend_window_days.description: Number of days to consider for trend calculation

error_messages: Invalid product ID: Product ID cannot be empty or contain special characters.
Price-source mismatch: Number of current prices must match number of price sources.
Invalid historical data: Historical data must be valid JSON format if provided.
Insufficient price data: At least one current price value is required.
Invalid trend window: Trend window must be between 1 and 365 days.
usage: Provide product_id, current_prices, and corresponding price_sources. Optionally include historical_data and set trend_window_days. Returns trend analysis and price change detection.

price_trends.description: Trend analysis for each price source (increasing, decreasing, stable)

average_price.description: Current average price across all sources

price_volatility.description: Price volatility score over the trend window

updated_timestamp.description: When the price history was last updated
